name: Febril
description:
Febril is a dice based rogue like with map progression.

You get to build your own dice using different dice faces that are dropped from mobs or bought from shops.

When you begin, the top-most row of dice represent the dices you have (they shuffle through their sides so you can recognize them), you can click on one to modify it.  Then, on the left-hand side, you pick which face of the die you want to replace. The faces available to you are the other lower row of dices (ones which are not cycling through their sides).

After this you press exit and go on to the map where you can continue down a path.

Little red enemies are normal encounters.

Big red enemies are elites.

Coin is shop where you can buy faces.

The goal is to fight and kill the boss.
